description: The Jolly Polly is a non-profit concession booth specializing in flavored Iced Cream Sodas, Coffee, The Fat Wally™ [Waffle on a stick dipped in chocolate and drizzled with caramel and raspberry sauce], made-from-scratch Cookies and Caramel Apples. Find us in Palm Springs and around the Coachella Valley!100% of proceeds are donated to TLZPS.org, a 501c3 national Parrot Rescue   located in Thousand Palms, California.
name: The Jolly Polly
